Dr. Khalimat Bostanova

  • General Medicine (2008 - 2014)
  • Professional Courses in Injection Cosmetology (2015)
  • Registered Specialist in Plastic Surgery (2016 - 2018)
  • Professional training in Family Medicine (2018)
  • Specialist in Pathological Anatomy (2020)

GP Aesthetics

Dr. Khalimat Bostanova is a general physician Aesthetics doctor. She has worked as a General Practitioner in Russia and performed plastic surgery operations. She has also assisted the chief surgeons on surgeries and performed injection cosmetology.

Experiences

  • Clinic "Olympic" - Medical Nurse, Russia (2013 - 2014)
  • Resident Doctor(Plastic Surgeon), Russia (2016 - 2018)
  • Clinic "Sova" - Plastic Surgeon (2021 - 2022)
  • Clinic "Cosmos" - General Practitioner, Russia (2018 - 2023)

ACHIEVEMENTS & AWARDS

  • DHA - General Practitioner Exam (Dubai)
  • DHP-MOPH state of Qatar - General Practitioner Exam
